replies.body: Bipolar posts = 1/6 of every post I see at least
Where was this? I run adblock as well and I've never seen that message on any of Riot Games sites.

> [{quoted}](name=oops,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=vPw2hWiX,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-05-22T09:37:49.585+0000)
>
> Where was this? I run adblock as well and I've never seen that message on any of Riot Games sites.

The Ekko comic page.
weird, i'm using adblock and i could access the entire thing with no problems.

I find it weird that LOL doesn't allow adblock despite having no ads other than a tiny Alienware link at the bottom of the page. Either way though, don't use adblock, it destroys alot of opportunity for business on the internet.

> [{quoted}](name=Telecasterdude,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=vPw2hWiX,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-05-22T09:09:13.195+0000)
>
> I find it weird that LOL doesn't allow adblock despite having no ads other than a tiny Alienware link at the bottom of the page. Either way though, don't use adblock, it destroys alot of opportunity for business on the internet.

The reason I use adblock isn't because I hate ads it's because they either

a)Slow down videos and sites (ty Australian net)
or
b)Show things you don't want to see

Also I have noticed there are some malicious ads on sites that will randomly send you to other places without your permission.

> [{quoted}](name=Telecasterdude,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=vPw2hWiX,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-05-22T09:09:13.195+0000)
>
> I find it weird that LOL doesn't allow adblock despite having no ads other than a tiny Alienware link at the bottom of the page. Either way though, don't use adblock, it destroys alot of opportunity for business on the internet.

So? Maybe these ads shouldn't intrude on my page and slow my bandwidth.
Why is this riots fault? you didnt show any context
